item.title: Michael Keaton Says the ‘Irony’ That Charlie Kirk Was ‘Killed With a Gun Is Unbelievable’: ‘Shooting People Will Never Answer Anything’
item.description: Michael Keaton paid respects to the late Charlie Kirk at Investigative Journalists and Reporters’ 50th anniversary gala on Monday night, while also speaking on the gun violence that took his life. “Be
